query:
UPDATE posts SET
                title = '',
                body = '',
                markdown_body = NULL,
                link_type = -1,
                link_url = NULL,
                link_embed = NULL,
                link_thumbnail_url = NULL,
                is_nsfw = false,
                is_spoiler = false,
                is_pinned = false,
                category_id = NULL,
                edit_timestamp = NOW(),
                delete_timestamp = NOW()
            WHERE creator_id = $1
